# fl-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                         | Type                                                           | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Set to true to disable the link.                                    | `boolean`                                                      | `false`     |
| `download` | `download` | Tells the browser to download the linked file as this filename.     | `string`                                                       | `undefined` |
| `href`     | `href`     | The link for this link tag.                                         | `string`                                                       | `undefined` |
| `loading`  | `loading`  | Set to true to draw the link in a loading state.                    | `boolean`                                                      | `false`     |
| `rel`      | `rel`      | Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object. | `string`                                                       | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | The link's size                                                     | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                               | `"medium"`  |
| `target`   | `target`   | Tells the browser where to open the link.                           | `"_blank" \| "_parent" \| "_self" \| "_top"`                   | `undefined` |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The link's type                                                     | `"danger" \| "default" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `"default"` |

| Part      | Description |
| --------- | ----------- |
| `"icon"`  |             |
| `"label"` |             |
